text:
I am just seeing this.

I would really really like this. As I contribute more and more to extendr I have to dig around the R source code to _guess_ what functions do which.

Add on top of this the whole hoopla about what is non-API changing every single day and causing my packages to be taken of CRAN, it is a bit of a nightmare to navigate.

Having something somewhere central that the community can actually contribute to would be lovely. We frequently have discussions about R’s C API in our extendr discord but that knowledge gets burried and lost and forgotten.
